pages.text: The Tendril Lash causes the Maw to sprout writhing appendages, extending your grasp beyond natural limits. This mutation immediately lengthens your reach (default +1).
As the beast evolves through higher Stages, these tendrils elongate further, granting an additional block of interaction range with every ascent in power.

Instability (Trick): The Maw possesses a chaotic, almost childlike malevolence. Finding amusement in your confusion, it may occasionally twitch and swap the contents of your main hand with your off-hand, purely for the sake of a twisted jest.
